bug.author: alalek
bug.description: Test log with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/9988>#9988</denchmark-link> : <denchmark-code>[ RUN ] OCL_Torch_Importer.net_softmax OpenCL error CL_INVALID_WORK_GROUP_SIZE (-54) during call: clEnqueueNDRangeKernel('kernel_channel_max', dims=1, globalsize=1x1x1, localsize=512x1x1) sync=true [ OK ] OCL_Torch_Importer.net_softmax (3 ms) </denchmark-code>
